item.description:
This is a cool place, has all the ambiance of an appalachian pig roast and it's cheap. They serve Seafood, Steaks & Corn on the Cob - all cooked over an open wood fire. Rustic seating (you put your rump on a stump) and yes there are tables. There is a huge red and white canopy in case it rains (it won't). The menu is Ala Carte - feel free to bring your own salad, chips etc and it is also BYOB. The one catch is they DO NOT ACCEPT CREDIT CARDS so bring cash or check. Did I mention this is BYOB?

This is as close as I could come to a website for "THE PLACE", but it will give you an idea of what you're in for: http://www.weloveclam...
It's easy to find on Route 1 in Guilford (Boston Post Rd) directly across the road from Wal-Mart.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the staff or look lost and we'll find you.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Cheap - Messy - Outdoor - BYOB - FUN
